headline: Electronic Arts Expands EA Sports Hiring As Valuation Premium Draws Attention
summary: Electronic Arts is increasing hiring for senior technology roles in its EA Sports unit in Metro Vancouver. The focus is on high calibre technical talent to support development across its core sports gaming franchises. The move reflects continued investment in EA Sports as a key part of Electronic Arts' global gaming portfolio. For investors watching Electronic Arts, ticker NasdaqGS:EA, the renewed hiring push comes with the stock trading at around $203.92. The company has seen a 66.7%...

headline: January jobs data, Alphabet and Amazon earnings, more Warsh fallout: What to watch this week
summary: Crucial labor market data, more earnings from Big Tech giants, and continued discussion over where Kevin Warsh may lead the central bank should set the agenda in the week ahead.
